reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique architectural features and room functions. Desc_1 (Living/Dining), Desc_4 (Garage), Desc_6 (Master Bedroom), Desc_7 (Dry/Wet Bathroom), Desc_9 (Open Shower Bathroom), and Desc_10 (Room with Balcony Door) were matched with high confidence to Images 1, 4, 6, 7, 9, and 10 respectively, as these images contained distinct, non-replicable elements. The kitchen descriptions required careful differentiation: Desc_13 was uniquely matched to Image 13 due to the visible staircase. Desc_3 was matched to Image 3 as it provides the wide, open-plan view encompassing both the dining area and the island. Images 2 and 5, being nearly identical views of the L-shaped kitchen with an island, were assigned to Desc_2 and Desc_5 sequentially. The three remaining empty secondary rooms (Images 8, 11, 12) are visually indistinguishable and were assigned sequentially to Desc_8, Desc_11, and Desc_12 to ensure a complete 1:1 mapping.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows a combined living area (sofa, TV wall) and dining area (table for 4) with large windows, matching the '客廳餐廳一體空間' tag.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(大面窗與薄紗窗簾), 通風良好(對外窗可開啟), 規劃完整客餐廳(沙發區與餐桌區動線清楚), 天花高度舒適(嵌燈與吊燈不壓迫), 收納機能佳(電視牆與展示層架), 新穎裝修(地磚與牆面狀況良好), 家具齊全(沙發與餐桌椅現成可用)

matching_result_list.evidence: L-shaped kitchen with white cabinets, stove, sink, and a prominent black granite island/bar counter ('用餐中島吧檯'). Assigned as the primary kitchen view.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 完整廚房設備(瓦斯爐與抽油煙機齊全), 操作檯面充足(L型流理台+中島), 通風良好(對外門窗相連), 用餐中島吧檯(附高腳椅適合簡餐與工作), 收納空間多(上中下櫃體完整), 新穎裝修(櫥櫃與檯面為新式材質), 照明充足(吊燈與天花燈均勻)

matching_result_list.evidence: Wide view showing the integration of the dining table and the kitchen island, confirming the '開放式餐廳與中島區' and '開放格局' tags.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 開放格局(餐廳與廚房互通方便交流), 用餐與備餐動線佳(中島連接流理台與餐桌), 採光普通(主要依靠客廳側採光), 收納展示一體(中島下方與牆面木作), 天花高度舒適(局部造型天花不壓迫), 適合多人用餐(四人以上餐桌配置)

matching_result_list.evidence: Semi-enclosed, covered outdoor space with a roll-up door and durable flooring, clearly functioning as a '騎樓／車庫'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 可停車或機車(地坪寬敞方正), 半戶外空間(鋼構頂棚遮雨), 採光一般(前方開口但側面封閉), 良好通風(前後可開放空氣流通), 地坪耐磨好清潔(拋光石英磚拼色地面), 適合曬衣或收納(邊牆空間可加裝架子)

matching_result_list.evidence: Identical kitchen layout to Image 2, showing the 'L型廚房格局' and the door on the left, supporting the '近後陽台出入口' tag.

extracted_feature.raw_description: L型廚房格局(操作動線順暢), 中島增加檯面(適合備餐與簡餐), 採光一般(以室內燈為主), 收納量大(多組吊櫃與下櫃), 抽油煙設備齊全(排油煙機明顯), 近後陽台出入口(方便晾衣與通風)

matching_result_list.evidence: The only furnished bedroom, featuring a large bed, bedside tables, and large windows, matching '主臥房' and '空間寬敞'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(落地窗搭配薄紗與遮光簾), 通風良好(大面窗可開啟), 收納充足(整面衣櫃與床側櫃), 空間寬敞(床邊仍保有走道), 新穎裝修(牆面與地面狀況良好), 獨立睡眠區(門窗位置提供隱私), 照明柔和(床頭燈與天花燈分區)

matching_result_list.evidence: Bathroom featuring a glass partition separating the shower area from the toilet/vanity, confirming '乾濕分離設計'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 乾濕分離設計(淋浴拉門區隔), 衛浴更新(磁磚與設備新穎), 通風可能仰賴排風(未見窗戶), 收納機能尚可(鏡櫃與側邊開放層架), 清潔容易(懸掛式洗手台與大面磁磚), 空間略緊湊(馬桶與淋浴距離較近)

matching_result_list.evidence: Empty room featuring a large sliding glass door leading outside, confirming '空房(帶陽台門)' and '可能連接陽台'.

matching_result_list.evidence: L-shaped kitchen view that clearly shows a staircase ('與樓梯相鄰') on the left side.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 完整廚具(雙口瓦斯爐與大流理台), L型配置(烹飪動線順暢), 連接後陽台門(適合洗衣與排油煙), 採光一般(靠室內燈與後門玻璃), 收納櫥櫃多(上下櫃體滿牆), 與樓梯相鄰(動線集中便於上下樓用餐), 新穎裝修(玻璃檯面防濺牆與白色櫥櫃)
